content: Prayer for the Peace of Jerusalem.
A Song of Ascents. Of David.
“Let us go to the house of the .”
As a city that is firmly joined together;
To which the [twelve] tribes go up, even the tribes of the ,
[As was decreed as] an ordinance for Israel,
To give thanks to the name of the .
For there the thrones of judgment were set,
The thrones of the house of David.
